resources.string:
Cheaters Paradise is just what it's name means if literally translated..

With this application, students from every school can access and update our database.

All subjects are supported but only image or text files can be uploaded, and of course respectively viewed or downloaded.

How to use:
-- to upload information, click "Post" then choose the file u want to upload, enter an appropriate topic, and submit it.
-- to get information that is already stored on the server, click "Browse" and find the topic that you need.
